article_title: Berkowitz campaign disputes claims made in Demboski's attack ad
article_text: "The context was trying to balance a budget when revenues were down," Fleek-Green said. "If you take that and compare it to the city's situation now, I don't see how it's different than what the Assembly is currently doing, which is looking at the tax exemptions that some of these religious nonprofits have in Anchorage."

article_metadata.description: A radio ad in the mayor race makes numerous claims about former Democratic state Rep. Ethan Berkowitz's record on taxation and spending, which his campaign manager said were distorted or untrue.

og.description: A radio ad in the mayor race makes numerous claims about former Democratic state Rep. Ethan Berkowitz's record on taxation and spending, which his campaign manager said were distorted or untrue.
og.title: Berkowitz campaign disputes claims made in Demboski's attack ad

article_summary:
"The context was trying to balance a budget when revenues were down," Fleek-Green said.
"If you take that and compare it to the city's situation now, I don't see how it's different than what the Assembly is currently doing, which is looking at the tax exemptions that some of these religious nonprofits have in Anchorage."
